inventory_type.description: Determines whether to modify the items in the inventory of the entity or the inventory of a power present in the entity.
inventory_type.markdownDescription: Determines whether to modify the items in the inventory of the entity or the inventory of a power present in the entity.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity *_before_* the items are modified.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity *_before_* the items are modified.

item_action.description: The action to be executed on the affected items.
item_action.markdownDescription: The action to be executed on the affected items.

item_condition.description: If specified, only items which fulfill this condition will be affected by specified action.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only items which fulfill this condition will be affected by specified action.

slot.description: If specified, only items in the designated slot will be modified.
slot.markdownDescription: If specified, only items in the designated slot will be modified.

slots.description: If specified, only items in the designated slots will be modified.
slots.markdownDescription: If specified, only items in the designated slots will be modified.

power.description: If specified, the items in the inventory of this power will be modified instead of the items in the entity's inventory if `inventory_type` is set to `"power"`.
power.markdownDescription: If specified, the items in the inventory of this power will be modified instead of the items in the entity's inventory if `inventory_type` is set to `"power"`.

process_mode.description: Determines how the affected item stacks in the specified inventory are modified.
process_mode.markdownDescription: Determines how the affected item stacks in the specified inventory are modified.

limit.description: Determines the max amount of times the action should modify item stacks in the inventory. If the specified value is <= `0`, then there will be no limit.
limit.markdownDescription: Determines the max amount of times the action should modify item stacks in the inventory. If the specified value is <= `0`, then there will be no limit.

type.description:
## Modify Inventory --- [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/modify_inventory) Modifies the items from either the entity's inventory or a power that uses the [Inventory (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/modify_inventory). Type ID: `origins:modify_inventory` --- ### Examples ```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:modify_inventory", "inventory_type": "power", "power": "origins:extra_inventory", "item_action": { "type": "origins:consume" } } ``` This example will consume each item in the inventory of the `origins:extra_inventory` power, decreasing their count by 1.
```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:modify_inventory", "item_condition": { "type": "origins:armor_value", "comparison": ">", "compare_to": 0 }, "item_action": { "type": "origins:damage", "amount": 1, "ignore_unbreaking": true } } ``` This example will slightly damage all items with an armor value.
